com.tencent.qcloud.network.action

类 QCloudRequestAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tencent.qcloud.network.action.QCloudRequestAction
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable
    直接已知子类:
    QCloudBodyMd5Action, QCloudBodySha1Action, QCloudSignatureAction

    public abstract class QCloudRequestAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable
    专为序列化HTTP请求所需要的长时间操作定义的QCloudAction类。 如：计算签名、计算文件SHA1值 Copyright 2010-2017 Tencent Cloud. All Rights Reserved.
